title: Fall Fashion
content: I've been working on this look for awhile.  This is a different hat, a present from Glenn.  My [Paul Kaufman original](http://worldgame.blogspot.com/2006/10/accessorized-quaker.html) has gone [missing again](http://worldgame.blogspot.com/2009/01/hat-adventure.html), maybe will show up on eBay someday.
author: Kirby Urner
